title: Digital Cannabis Certificate
description: Digital Cannabis Certificate Certificate Data Types

pi.description: product identifier, URN format as defined in the documentation

bi.description: Batch Identifier, URN format as defined in the documentation

u.description: Unit of measurement for substance, eiter grams or milliliter

f.description: Form of the cannabis drug, e - extract, f - flower

thc.description: Percentage of THC in the substance, between 0 and 1

cbd.description: Percentage of CBD in the substance, between 0 and 1

exp.description: Expiry of the packaged substance, ISO8601 date
